This could be a result of trying to play a corrupted song.

homePage.listenMoreToShowMetrics: Listen to more songs to show additional metrics.

searchPage.searchForAnythingInLibrary: Search for anything in your library
searchPage.separateKeywords: Use ' ; ' to separate keywords while searching.

songsPage.loading: Hold on. We are getting everything ready for you...

foldersPage.empty: No folders added to your library.

playlistsPage.clearSongHistoryConfirmNotice: Are you sure you want to clear your song history? This action cannot be undone.
playlistsPage.clearSongHistorySuccess: Your song history has been cleared successfully.

settingsPage.changeTheme: Change the theme of the application to your preference.
settingsPage.enableImageBasedDynamicThemesDescription: Change app theme dynamically based on the theme of the current playing song cover image
settingsPage.languageDescription: Select the language you want Nora to be displayed in.
settingsPage.showRemainingSongDurationDescription: Shows the remaining duration of the song instead of the default song duration.
settingsPage.changePlaybackRate: Change the default playback speed of the player.
settingsPage.seekbarScrollInterval: Change the increment amount when scrolled over audio seek bar and volume seek bar.
settingsPage.lastFmDescription1: Connect with Last.fm to enable Scrobbling.
settingsPage.lastFmDescription2: Scrobbling is a way to send information about the music a user is listening to.
settingsPage.lastFmDescription3: Whenever you listen to a song, Last.fm “Scrobbles” that song and adds it to your account.
settingsPage.lastFmDescription4: This feature requires an internet connection.
settingsPage.scrobblingDescription: Enable Last.fm Scrobbling to send data related to how you listen to songs.
settingsPage.sendFavoritesToLastFmDescription: Send favorites data to Last.fm when you like/dislike songs.
settingsPage.sendNowPlayingToLastFmDescription: Send the currently playing song data to Last.fm automatically when you start to play a song.
settingsPage.enableDiscordRpcDescription: Integrate Discord Rich Presence with Nora
settingsPage.enableMusixmatchLyricsDescription: Enable Musixmatch Lyrics, which provides synced and unsynced lyrics for your songs on-demand.
settingsPage.musixmatchDisclaimerNotice: Enabling and using this feature means that you agree to, and accept the <Button>Musixmatch Lyrics Disclaimer</Button>.
settingsPage.saveLyricsAutomaticallyDescription: Select an option to save song lyrics automatically when fetched in lyrics page.
settingsPage.saveLyricsAutomaticallyInfo: Automatically downloaded lyrics will be saved after the current song is finished to prevent any corruption from happening.
settingsPage.saveLyricsInLrcFilesDescription: Enable saving lyrics in LRC files for songs that support metadata editing. Nora will save lyrics in an LRC file if the song file doesn't support metadata editing.
settingsPage.saveLyricsInLrcFiles: Also save lyrics in LRC files for supported songs
settingsPage.lrcFileCustomSaveLocationDescription: Select a custom location to save LRC files of songs if you don't want to save them in the same folder as the relative song.
settingsPage.changeDefaultPageDescription: Change the default page you want to see when you open the app.
settingsPage.songIndexingDescription: Enables indexing of songs in pages, adding a number to each song in the Songs tab.
settingsPage.showTrackNumberAsSongIndexDescription: Show track number in front of the song when in albums page.
settingsPage.showTrackNumberAsSongIndex: Show track number as song index
settingsPage.showArtistArtworkNearSongControlsDescrip: Shows artist artworks next to the artist names near the title of the song on the song controls panel.
settingsPage.showArtistArtworkNearSongControls: Show available artist artworks next to their name (bottom left).
settingsPage.disableBackgroundArtworksDescription: Disables the large artworks shown on the background of some pages.
settingsPage.playlistArtworksDescription: Change the behavior of artworks made from song covers.
settingsPage.enablePlaylistArtworks: Enable artworks made from song covers on playlists
settingsPage.shuffleArtworkFromSongCovers: Enable shuffling the artwork made from song covers. (The artworks shuffle each time a page refresh happens.)
settingsPage.reducedMotionDescription: Removes animation that appears in the app. This will also reduce the smoothness of the app.
settingsPage.removeAnimationOnBatteryDescription: Removes the animations in the app when your system is on battery power.
settingsPage.removeAnimationOnBattery: Remove animations when on battery power.
settingsPage.allowToPreventScreenSleepingDescription: Allow Nora to prevent the display from going to sleep in situations with no user activity like displaying lyrics.
settingsPage.allowToPreventScreenSleeping: Allow preventing the display from going to sleep.
settingsPage.autoLaunchAtStartDescription: Enabling this setting will automatically launch Nora when you login to your computer.
settingsPage.hideWindowAtStartDescription: Configure whether Nora should be visible when it's started up.
settingsPage.hideWindowAtStart: Launch Nora in the System Tray on startup
settingsPage.hideWindowOnCloseDescription: Configure how Nora should behave when you click the close button.
settingsPage.hideWindowOnClose: Hide Nora to the System Tray when the close button is clicked.
settingsPage.storageDescription: See how Nora manages your library and utilizes your storage.
settingsPage.noStorageMetrics: Seems like you haven't generated storage metrics yet.
settingsPage.storageMetricsGenerationDisclaimer: Generating storage metrics is a relatively demanding computational task, this means Nora may become unresponsive temporarily. Please be patient...
settingsPage.storageMetricsGenerationError: Seems like something went wrong on our end. Please report this to the developer.
settingsPage.noraDescription: Nora is an elegant music player built using Electron and React.
settingsPage.noraInspiration: Inspired by <Hyperlink>Oto Music for Android</Hyperlink> by Piyush Mamidwar.
settingsPage.otoMusicOnPlayStore: Oto Music for Android on the Play Store
settingsPage.noraLicenseNotice: This product is licensed under the <Button>MIT licence.</Button>
settingsPage.songHistoryDeletionDisclaimer: Are you sure you want to clear your song history? This action cannot be undone.
settingsPage.songHistoryDeletionSuccess: Your song history has been cleared successfully.
settingsPage.contact: If you have any feedback about bugs, feature requests (etc.) about the app, please <Hyperlink>$t(settingsPage.createIssueOnNoraGithubRepo)</Hyperlink>
settingsPage.emailContact: or contact me through my email.

lyricsEditingPage.resetLyricsConfirm: Are your sure that you want to Reset Lyrics?
lyricsEditingPage.resetLyricsConfirmMessage:
You will lose recent lyrics line modifications and start/end synchronization data if you continue this action.


This action is irreversible.

lyricsPage.noLyricsDescription: We couldn't find any lyrics for this song. You can add your own in the Tag Editor.
lyricsPage.noSyncedLyricsDescription: We couldn't find any synced lyrics for this song.
lyricsPage.noInternetDescription: There are no offline lyrics for this song. You need an internet connection to check for online lyrics.

songInfoPage.listeningActivityInLastMonths: Listening activity in the Last {{count}} Months

songTagsEditingPage.updateAddedToBeSavedLater: Metadata updates of currently playing songs will be saved after the song playback is finished.
songTagsEditingPage.pendingUpdateAvailable: A metadata update of this song is pending to be saved.
songTagsEditingPage.saveTagsNotSupportedDescription: <P1>Nora currently doesn't support editing song metadata in <Format/> format.</P1><P2>Currently only <SupportedFormat/> format is supported.
songTagsEditingPage.albumArtistNotMentioned: Song is already part of the album named `{{title}}` but its artist(s) '{{artists}}' is/are not specified as the album artist(s) for this song.
songTagsEditingPage.songAlbumArtistMismatch: Selected album artist(s) '{{albumArtists}}' don't match with the selected album '{{albumTitle}}' artist(s) '{{songAlbumArtists}}'.
songTagsEditingPage.avoidUnsyncedOnSyncedLyricsTab: Avoid entering unsynchronized lyrics in the synchronized lyrics tab.
songTagsEditingPage.avoidSyncedOnUnsyncedLyricsTab: Avoid entering synchronized lyrics in the unsynchronized lyrics tab.
songTagsEditingPage.pendingLyricsSavesAvailable: There are pending lyrics to be saved to this song. They will be saved and visible here after the current song is finished playing.
songTagsEditingPage.musixmatchNotEnabled: 'You have to enable Musixmatch Lyrics from Settings to use this feature.

confirmDeletePlaylistsPrompt.message_one: Removing this playlist will remove the connection between songs that you organized into this playlist. You won't be able to access this playlist again if you decide to delete it.
confirmDeletePlaylistsPrompt.message_other: Removing these playlists will remove the connection between songs that you organized into these playlists. You won't be able to access these playlists again if you decide to delete it.
confirmDeletePlaylistsPrompt.modificationNotice: Performing this action will affect these files:

resetAppConfirmationPrompt.message: Resetting the app removes all user data, including data related to songs, favorites, preferences, applied settings, etc., but NOT the songs themselves. Please note that this action is IRREVERSIBLE.
resetAppConfirmationPrompt.restartAfterReset: Nora will restart after the reset.
resetAppConfirmationPrompt.systemPlaylistsRemovalProhibited: You cannot remove playlists like History or Favorites.

addSongsToPlaylistsPrompt.duplicationNotice: When adding multiple songs to playlists, songs that are already in selected playlists will be ignored.

blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.title: Confirm blacklisting $t(common.songWithCount, {"count":{{count}}}) from the library
blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.message_one: You are about to blacklist this song from the library. You can restore it again by right-clicking it and clicking '$t(song.deblacklist)'. Your data related to this song won't be affected by this action.
blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.message_other: You are about to blacklist these songs from the library. You can restore them again by right-clicking and clicking '$t(song.deblacklist)'. Your data related to these songs won't be affected by this action.
blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.effect1: Will appear greyed-out in the library with a '<span/>' symbol.
blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.effect2: Won't be added to the queue automatically, not even through '$t(common.shuffleAndPlay)' or'$t(common.playAll)', unless you explicitly add them.
blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.effect3: Can still be played by double-clicking, or by using either '$t(common.play)' or '$t(common.playNext)'.
blacklistSongConfirmPrompt.songsBlacklisted: $t(common.songWithCount, {"count":{{count}}}) blacklisted and removed from the library

blacklistFolderConfirmPrompt.title: Confirm blacklisting $t(common.folderWithCount, {"count":{{count}}}) from the library
blacklistFolderConfirmPrompt.message_one: You are about to blacklist this folder. You can restore it again from the Folders page by right-clicking and selecting '$t(song.deblacklist)'. Your data related to this folder won't be affected by this action.
blacklistFolderConfirmPrompt.message_other: You are about to blacklist these folders. You can restore them again from the Folders page by right-clicking and selecting '$t(song.deblacklist)'. Your data related to these folders won't be affected by this action.
blacklistFolderConfirmPrompt.effect1: Will appear greyed out in the library with '<span/>' symbol.
blacklistFolderConfirmPrompt.effect2: Songs linked to this folder will also be blacklisted.
blacklistFolderConfirmPrompt.effectTitle2: What happens to songs linked to a blacklisted folder

deleteSongFromSystemConfirmPrompt.message_one: You will lose this song from your system and may not be able to recover it again if you select '$t(deleteSongFromSystemConfirmPrompt.permanentlyDeleteFromSystem)' from system option.
deleteSongFromSystemConfirmPrompt.message_other: You will lose these songs from your system and may not be able to recover them again if you select '$t(deleteSongFromSystemConfirmPrompt.permanentlyDeleteFromSystem)' from system option.
deleteSongFromSystemConfirmPrompt.modificationNotice: Proceeding this action affects these files :

addMusicFoldersPrompt.title: Select folders to add
addMusicFoldersPrompt.emptyMessage1: Seems like you didn't select any folders.
addMusicFoldersPrompt.emptyMessage2: Choose some folders from your system, and they will appear here for you to further customize them.
addMusicFoldersPrompt.noFoldersSelected: No folders selected. (Must have one parent folder)

removeFolderConfirmationPrompt.title: Confirm to remove `{{folderName}}` folder
removeFolderConfirmationPrompt.message: Are you sure that you want to remove this folder from the music library? This will remove all the data related to this folder including songs data from the music library. The files on your system will remain untouched.

lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.title: How to use Nora's lyrics editor
lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.subTitle1: How to start using the editor?
lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.subTitle1Message:
1. Play the song that you are trying to edit lyrics of. (If you are not in the correct song, app will prevent adding incorrect metadata to lyrics lines.)
  2. Click on the page area to get focus to the page. (Page focus is required for the page-specific keyboard shortcuts to work.)
  3. Start the song from the begining. If you want more control over the playback, set to repeat the current song.
  4. When the voice of the song is saying the lyrics line, press $t(appShortcutsPrompt.enterKey) to highlight the next lyrics line and add the current time to start tag.
  5. Continue until the last lyrics line.
lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.subTitle2: What are the keyboard shortcuts I can use in the Lyrics Editor?
lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.subTitle2Message: Go to the <Button>Shortcuts Prompt</Button> to see the relevant shortcuts that can be used in the Lyrics Editor.
lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.subTitle3Message:
1. Pause the song.
  2. Locate the relevant lyrics line.
  3. Click the Edit button below that line and make the necessary modifications.
  4. After the modifications, click $t(lyricsEditingPage.finishEditing) to complete the modifications.
lyricsEditorHelpPrompt.subTitle4: I added wrong data to the wrong line?

lyricsEditorSavePrompt.saveLyricsNotSupported: Nora currently doesn't support saving lyrics to songs in '{{format}}' audio format.
lyricsEditorSavePrompt.readAboutLrcFormat: Read more about the LRC format

lyricsEditorSettingsPrompt.editNextAndCurrentStartAndEndTagsAutomat: Change the start time tag of the next lyrics line when you edit the end time tag of the current lyrics line and vice versa automatically.
Edit next line's start tag with the current line's end tag and vice versa automatically.
lyricsEditorSettingsPrompt.lyricOffsetInputDescription: Select a negative or positive offset to add to lyrics lines when editing them automatically.

releaseNotesPrompt.oldVersion: You do not have the latest version. Update now
releaseNotesPrompt.outdatedChangelogNotice: You may be viewing an outdated changelog.
releaseNotesPrompt.versionCheckError:
Failed to check for new updates. Something is wrong in our end.
$t(releaseNotesPrompt.outdatedChangelogNotice)
releaseNotesPrompt.versionCheckNetworkError:
We couldn't check for new updates. Check you network connection and try again.
$t(releaseNotesPrompt.outdatedChangelogNotice)
releaseNotesPrompt.doNotRemindThisVersionUpdate: Do not remind me again about this version of the app.

appShortcutsPrompt.toggleMiniPlayerAlwaysOnTop: Toggle Mini Player always on top

clearLocalStoragePrompt.title: Confirm clearing local storage data
clearLocalStoragePrompt.description: This process will clear any corrupted local storage data in Nora and revert it back to the default settings.
clearLocalStoragePrompt.effect:
Proceeding this action will affect the following data:

  • Most preference settings in Nora
  • Playback settings such as currently playing song, volume etc.
  • Current queue data
  • Ignored suggestions data such as featuring artists, separate artists and duplicates
  • Page sorting data
  • Equalizer data
  • Lyrics editor settings
clearLocalStoragePrompt.restartNotice: Nora will restart after the process.

musixmatchDisclaimerPrompt.title: Disclaimer - Musixmatch Lyrics
musixmatchDisclaimerPrompt.message:
• Musixmatch Lyrics is added as an evaluation feature to this software and could be removed at any time.
  • Nora is in no way affiliated with, authorised, maintained, sponsored or endorsed by Musixmatch Lyrics or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
  • The maintainers of this application call upon the personal responsibility of its users to use this feature in a fair way, as it is intended to be used by obeying the copyrights implemented by Musixmatch Lyrics.
musixmatchDisclaimerPrompt.contactAboutComplaints: If you have any complaints, you can contact me through the Nora Discord server, or through my <Hyperlink>email</Hyperlink>.

musixmatchSettingsPrompt.title: Musixmatch settings
musixmatchSettingsPrompt.message:
• Musixmatch requires a user token to provide its service properly.
  • Musixmatch can sometimes fail to show lyrics due to prolonged use of the service from the same token.
  • Follow the guide from Spicetify Wiki to get a new Musixmatch token.
musixmatchSettingsPrompt.tokenMissingCharacters: TOKEN should be a string with 54 characters. ({{count}} more characters required).
musixmatchSettingsPrompt.tokenIncorrectCharacters: TOKEN should only contain alpha-numeric characters.
musixmatchSettingsPrompt.savedTokenAvailableMessage:
A valid Musixmatch token saved by the user is already available in Nora.

You only need to change the token if the service is not functioning properly.

resetTagsToDefaultPrompt.title: Confirm before resetting song data to default
resetTagsToDefaultPrompt.description: Are you sure you want to reset the song data? You will lose the data you edited on this screen.

errorPrompt.title: An error occurred
errorPrompt.sendErrorInfo: Please send us <Hyperlink1>feedback</Hyperlink1> to improve the app or <Hyperlink2>create an issue</Hyperlink2> on Github.

openLinkConfirmPrompt.description:
You are trying to open a link that will take you to .
This link will be opened from your default browser.
openLinkConfirmPrompt.doNotVerifyLink: Do not verify when trying to open a link.

songUnplayableErrorPrompt.title: Couldn't play the song
songUnplayableErrorPrompt.description: Seems like we can't play that song. Please check whether the selected song is available in your system and accessible by the app.

unsupportedFileMessagePrompt.title: Unsupported audio file
unsupportedFileMessagePrompt.description:
You are trying to open a file with a extension, which is not supported by this app.
Currently, we only support following audio formats.

duplicateArtistsSuggestion.message:
Are the same artist?

If they are, you can link content of them into a single artist, or you can ignore this suggestion.

separateArtistsSuggestion.message:
Are {{count}} separate artists?

If they are, you can organize them by selecting them as separate artists, or you can ignore this suggestion.

featArtistsSuggestion.message_one:
Is an artist featuring in this song?

If so, you can add that artist as an artist of the song, or you can ignore this suggestion.
featArtistsSuggestion.message_other:
Are {{count}} artists featuring in this song?

If so, you can add those artists as artists of the song, or you can ignore this suggestion.
featArtistsSuggestion.featArtistsTitleReset: Remove featuring artists information from song title after adding artists to the song.
featArtistsSuggestion.editInMetadataEditingPage: Edit in the metadata editing page
featArtistsSuggestion.modificationNotice: Keep in mind that adding featuring artists to the song will update the song data in the library as well as the song metadata.

notifications.noSongDataEdits: You didn't change any song data.
notifications.alreadyInPage: You are already in the current page.
notifications.playbackRateReset: Playback rate has been reset to 1x
notifications.playbackPausedDueToSongDeletion: Current song playback paused because the song was deleted.

backend.RESET_FAILED: Resetting the app failed. Reloading the app now.
backend.OPEN_SONG_IN_EXPLORER_FAILED: Opening song file in explorer failed because song couldn't be found in the library.
backend.PENDING_METADATA_UPDATES_SAVED: Successfully saved pending metadata updates of `{{title}}`.
backend.SONG_EXT_NOT_SUPPORTED_FOR_LYRICS_SAVES: Lyrics cannot be saved because current song extension ({{ext}}) is not supported for modifying metadata.
backend.LASTFM_LOGIN_SUCCESS: You successfully logged in to LastFM.
backend.SONG_PALETTE_GENERATING_PROCESS_UPDATE: Generating palettes for {{value}} out of {{total}} songs.
backend.GENRE_PALETTE_GENERATING_PROCESS_UPDATE: Generating palettes for {{value}} out of {{total}} genres.
backend.MUSIC_FOLDER_DELETED: `{{name}}` folder got deleted from the system. $t(common.songWithCount, {"count":{{count}}}) related to that folder will be removed from the library.
backend.EMPTY_MUSIC_FOLDER_DELETED: `{{name}}` folder got deleted from the system. No songs found related to the folder. Library will be unaffected.
backend.WHITELISTING_FOLDER_FAILED_DUE_TO_BLACKL: Couldn't whitelist `{{folderName}}` folder because its parent folder '{{parentFolderName}}' is also blacklisted. Whitelist the parent folder to whitelist this folder.
backend.WHITELISTING_SONG_FAILED_DUE_TO_BLACKLIS: '{{songName}}' cannot be whitelisted because its directory '{{directoryName}}' is also blacklisted. Whitelist the directory to whitelist this song.
backend.ARTWORK_SAVED: Saved the artwork to the request location.
backend.PLAYBACK_FROM_UNKNOWN_SOURCE: You are playing a song outside from your library.
backend.NO_MORE_SONG_PALETTES: No more palettes for songs to be generated.
backend.NO_MORE_GENRE_PALETTES: No more palettes for genres to be generated.
backend.PARSE_FAILED: `{{name}}` failed when trying to add the song to the library. Go to settings to resync the library.
backend.LYRICS_SAVE_QUEUED: Lyrics for `{{title}}` will be saved automatically.
backend.LYRICS_SAVED_IN_LRC_FILE: `Lyrics for this song with '{{ext}}' extension will be saved in an LRC file.
backend.APPDATA_IMPORT_STARTED: Started to import app data. Please wait...
backend.APPDATA_IMPORT_FAILED_DUE_TO_MISSING_FIL: $t(backend.APPDATA_IMPORT_FAILED) Missing required files in the selected folder.
backend.APPDATA_EXPORT_STARTED: Started to export app data. Please wait...
backend.APPDATA_EXPORT_FAILED: Error occurred when exporting app data.
backend.PLAYLIST_IMPORT_FAILED_DUE_TO_SONGS_OUTS: Found $t(common.songWithCount, {"count":{{count}}}) outside the library when importing a playlist which is not supported.
backend.PLAYLIST_IMPORT_FAILED_DUE_TO_INVALID_FI: Failed to import the playlist because user selected a file with invalid file data.
Playlist import failed because the selected file type wasn't '.m3u8'.
backend.PLAYLIST_IMPORT_TO_EXISTING_PLAYLIST_FAI: Error occurred when importing songs to an existing playlist.
backend.SONG_REPARSE_FAILED: Error occurred when re-parsing the song.
